best_seeds.english: She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.
best_seeds.italian: Lei è stata molto gentile quando mi ha visto nervoso.

best_seeds.english: Even if he wanted to he wouldn't be able to.
I don't understand what you said.
Have you seen my keys anywhere?
best_seeds.italian: Hai visto le mie chiavi da qualche parte?

best_seeds.english: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
best_seeds.italian: Non sono sicuro se riesco a ricordare tutta la frase.

best_seeds.english: I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.
best_seeds.italian: Ho dimenticato la parola che stavo cercando di dire.

best_seeds.english: You're like someone I used to know.
We don't want to interrupt the story.
We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.
best_seeds.italian: Dobbiamo lavorare sodo per imparare molte parole nuove.

worst_seeds.english: That child with the black hair opposite the post office.
worst_seeds.italian: Quel bambino con i capelli neri di fronte all'ufficio postale.

worst_seeds.english: We don't need to stand until everybody else is ready.
worst_seeds.italian: Non abbiamo bisogno di stare in piedi finché tutti gli altri non sono pronti.

worst_seeds.english: Do you know my sister's friend?
I know that young woman who's talking to your friend.
worst_seeds.italian: Conosco quella giovane che sta parlando con il tuo amico.

worst_seeds.english: I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.
worst_seeds.italian: Mi sono svegliato prima di quanto volevo stamattina.

worst_seeds.english: I think that she doesn't want to work from home.
worst_seeds.italian: Penso che lei non voglia lavorare da casa.
